audios.au: On motor vehicles the ECAS remote-control unit is mostly located near to the driver seat.
On the trailer a special protective box is mounted on the vehicle side. By means of the remote-control unit the following functions can be performed:
- Raising and lowering the whole chassis, or front or rear separately
- Raising and lowering the lifting axle
- Activating a traction help by raising the lifting axle
Selecting from up to 3 driving levels
.. and storing and addressing of up to 2 so called memory levels M1 and M2.
